name: nativescript-star-ratings
description: NativeScript star ratings UI component plugin.

scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-star-ratings && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-star-ratings && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rm -rf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rm -rf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
